targets.query: SELECT moving_average(sum("rate5m"), 10) FROM "bot__messages_processed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("mean") AS "50p", mean("p99") AS "99p", mean("max"), mean("rate5m") AS "rate" FROM "database__database_query" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "query"
SELECT moving_average(mean("mean"), 5) FROM "database__database_query" WHERE ("Query" != 'GetSwitches') AND ("Query" != "Value") AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "Query"
